name: Ch.9ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Joshua;Hmmm...|I think I could get used to being by the sea...|A lot better than being in sand all the time...
speak;Joshua;I have a feeling trouble is approaching...
speak;Larachel;Excuse me sir!|I'm looking for a man who must be lost!|He has brown hair, likes to sneak around, mildly handsome.|Have you seen him around?
speak;Joshua;I'm sorry there pretty lady.|Can't say that I have.
speak;Larachel;Oooo, that Rennac!|Where in the world can he have gone off to!|*Sigh* Well, thank you sir.|If you see him around, please let me know...
speak;Joshua;Why do I get the feeling that she was royalty?...|Glad she went away though, that was a close one...|Last thing I need is more royalty to deal with...
